abstract: Corner Office column features interview with Ruckus Wireless president and chief executive Selina Lo, who discusses her management style.
snippet: Selina Lo of Ruckus Wireless says that “the art of management is not something I have the patience for,” but that she hires people who excel in the areas she doesn’t.
lead_paragraph: Selina Lo of Ruckus Wireless says that “the art of management is not something I have the patience for,” but that she hires people who excel in the areas she doesn’t.

headline.main: I Never Wanted to Be a Manager. But I’ve Learned.
headline.seo: Selina Lo of Ruckus Wireless, on Leadership vs. Management
headline.print_headline: I Never Wanted To Be a Manager. But I’ve Learned.
